name: Charles2
description:
Beyond 111% to 222%, we doubled up!
222% first project charles2!!
Avoid quickly the enemies coming by moving the plane.
If you simply avoid it, you idiot! Destroy, destroy, and destroy dots!
You can meet many cute emoji bosses and items while playing.
You will be a fantastic player if you break final boss at 255stage!

You Just Enjoy
“Charles2” by 222%
